thread.title: Fantastic hotel!
thread.title_full: Fantastic hotel! - Review of The Iroquois New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: pamelak199
title: Fantastic hotel!
text: Personal, friendly service in a comfortable room at an ideal location. This is our second stay and we would definitely return. The hotel's quality is very much down to the lovely staff and the diligence and personal attention of the manager, Breandan. He is genuinely concerned that all of his guests have a truly great experience, which we did.
